entry.name: transfer
entry.title: Transfer Effect
entry.desc: Transfers the outline of an element to another element

longdesc.p: Very useful when trying to visualize interaction between two elements.
The transfer element iself has the class name "ui-effects-transfer", and needs to be styled by you, for example by adding a background or border.

option.name: className
option.desc: Optional class name the transfer element will receive.

option.name: to
option.desc: jQuery selector, the element to transfer to.

option.name: duration
option.desc: The number of ms the animation will run for

option.name: complete
option.desc: A callback function, executed when the effect completes

example.desc: Clicking on the green element transfers to the other.
